Setup)","hoverEvent":{"action":"show_text","contents":[{"text":"Click to jump"}]},"clickEvent":{"action":"change_page","value":"29"}}]','[{"text":"","font":"minecraft:default","color":"black"},{"text":"","font":"minecraft:bcsmp","color":"white"},{"text":"\\n\\n\\nThe "},{"text":"Temperature System","color":"green"},{"text":" shows your body temperature at all times on your "},{"text":"Actionbar","color":"gold"},{"text":". You can disable the actionbar with"},{"text":" this command","color":"red","hoverEvent":{"action":"show_text","contents":[{"text":"/trigger ToggleTemperatureDisplay"}]},"clickEvent":{"action":"run_command","value":"/trigger ToggleTemperatureDisplay"}},{"text":", but the temperature will still be calculated."}]','[{"text":"","font":"minecraft:default","color":"black"},{"text":"","font":"minecraft:bcsmp","color":"white"},{"text":"\\n\\n\\nYour temperature depends on:"},{"text":"\\n","font":"minecraft:bcsmp"},{"text":" Biome","color":"green","hoverEvent":{"action":"show_text","contents":[{"text":"Every biome has its own temperature. And some biomes are influenced more or less by daytime changes."}]}},{"text":"\\n","font":"minecraft:bcsmp"},{"text":" Daytime","color":"green","hoverEvent":{"action":"show_text","contents":[{"text":"The closer it is to noon, the higher the temperature. Midnight is the coldest."}]}},{"text":"\\n","font":"minecraft:bcsmp"},{"text":" Held Item","color":"green","hoverEvent":{"action":"show_text","contents":[{"text":"Holding warm or cold items in your mainhand or offhand changes your temperature. A special case of this is the \'Frost Walker\' enchantment, which can affect your temperature when worn."}]}},{"text":"\\n","font":"minecraft:bcsmp"},{"text":" Surrounding Blocks","color":"green","hoverEvent":{"action":"show_text","contents":[{"text":"Warm or cold blocks in a small radius around you change your temperature. The closer they are, the greater the impact. This feature can be turned off in the settings."}]}},{"text":"\\n","font":"minecraft:bcsmp"},{"text":" Altitude","color":"green","hoverEvent":{"action":"show_text","contents":[{"text":"Being at a very low or very high Y-Level decreases your temperature. The area around Y=90 is the warmest."}]}},{"text":"\\n","font":"minecraft:bcsmp"},{"text":" Being wet","color":"green","hoverEvent":{"action":"show_text","contents":[{"text":"Stepping into water, standing in rain or getting splashed by Water Bottles makes you drip water temporarily. The wetter you are, the greater the impact. You dry faster when your temperature is higher."}]}}]','[{"text":"","font":"minecraft:default","color":"black"},{"text":"","font":"minecraft:bcsmp","color":"white"},{"text":"\\n\\n\\nYou start taking damage in extreme temperatures. Lower than 0.0° is too cold, higher than 35.0° is too hot. These temperature limits can be changed with certain items: (View next page)"}]','[{"text":"","font":"minecraft:default","color":"black"},{"text":"","font":"minecraft:bcsmp","color":"white"},{"text":"\\n\\n\\nLowers Freezing Temperature:","color":"gold"},{"text":"\\n","font":"minecraft:bcsmp"},{"text":" Leather Armor"},{"text":"\\n","font":"minecraft:bcsmp"},{"text":" Frost Resistance","hoverEvent":{"action":"show_text","contents":[{"text":"Potion Effect"}]}},{"text":"\\nRaises Burning Temperature:","color":"gold"},{"text":"\\n","font":"minecraft:bcsmp"},{"text":" Fire Protection","hoverEvent":{"action":"show_text","contents":[{"text":"Enchantment"}]}},{"text":"\\n","font":"minecraft:bcsmp"},{"text":" Fire Resistance","hoverEvent":{"action":"show_text","contents":[{"text":"Potion Effect"}]}},{"text":"\\n","font":"minecraft:bcsmp"},{"text":" Heat Resistance","hoverEvent":{"action":"show_text","contents":[{"text":"Potion Effect"}]}}]','[{"text":"","font":"minecraft:default","color":"black"},{"text":"","font":"minecraft:bcsmp","color":"white"},{"text":"\\n\\n\\nCustom Potions:\\n","color":"blue"},{"text":"You can find "},{"text":"Reinforced Glass Bottles","color":"green"},{"text":" as rare loot from Structures, Piglin Barters, Fishing or Dragon Fights. Fill them with "},{"text":"Lava","color":"gold"},{"text":" or "},{"text":"Powder Snow","color":"#00EEFF"},{"text":" and put them in a Brewing Stand."}]','[{"text":"","font":"minecraft:default","color":"black"},{"text":"","font":"minecraft:bcsmp","color":"white"},{"text":"\\n\\n\\nCustom Potions:\\n","color":"blue"},{"text":"If the Brewing Stand gets struck by "},{"text":"Lightning","color":"#FFB917"},{"text":", the filled bottles turn into "},{"text":"Temperature Resistance Potions","color":"light_purple"},{"text":". After consumption, they temporarily make you more resistant to extreme temperatures."}]','[{"text":"","font":"minecraft:default","color":"black"},{"text":"","font":"minecraft:bcsmp","color":"white"},{"text":"\\n\\n\\nCustom Potions:\\n","color":"blue"},{"text":"Alternatively, you can add Gunpowder to the Brewing Stand to create "},{"text":"Splash Temperature Resistance Potions","color":"light_purple"},{"text":". They last longer, but you will not get the bottle back upon consumption."}]','[{"text":"","font":"minecraft:default","color":"black"},{"text":"","font":"minecraft:bcsmp","color":"white"},{"text":"\\n\\n\\nYou will find "},{"text":"Faction Outposts","color":"green"},{"text":" randomly generated in your world. In these you will find a "},{"text":"Faction Outpost Manager","color":"red"},{"text":". To create a Faction, buy a piece of Paper from it and rename it to your "},{"text":"Faction Name","color":"light_purple"},{"text":"."}]','[{"text":"","font":"minecraft:default","color":"black"},{"text":"","font":"minecraft:bcsmp","color":"white"},{"text":"\\n\\n\\nFinally drop the piece of Paper into the "},{"text":"Faction Outpost Manager","color":"red"},{"text":", along with a "},{"text":"Wool Color","color":"gold"},{"text":" (Which sets the Faction\'s color) and a "},{"text":"Banner","color":"gold"},{"text":" (Which sets the Faction\'s Logo)."}]','[{"text":"","font":"minecraft:default","color":"black"},{"text":"","font":"minecraft:bcsmp","color":"white"},{"text":"\\n\\n\\nTo "},{"text":"invite people","color":"light_purple"},{"text":" to your faction, right-click the "},{"text":"Invite Manager","color":"red"},{"text":" with an "},{"text":"Emerald","color":"dark_green"},{"text":" to purchase an "},{"text":"Invite Token","color":"gold"},{"text":". Give this token to someone else and have them right-click the "},{"text":"Invite Manager","color":"red"},{"text":" with it to join your Faction."}]','[{"text":"","font":"minecraft:default","color":"black"},{"text":"","font":"minecraft:bcsmp","color":"white"},{"text":"\\n\\n\\nTo leave your faction, type "},{"text":"this command","color":"red","hoverEvent":{"action":"show_text","contents":[{"text":"/trigger LeaveFaction"}]},"clickEvent":{"action":"copy_to_clipboard","value":"/trigger LeaveFaction"}},{"text":". If you were the Faction Leader, it will automatically select someone else as a Leader. If the Faction is empty, it will get deleted."}]','[{"text":"","font":"minecraft:default","color":"black"},{"text":"","font":"minecraft:bcsmp","color":"white"},{"text":"\\n\\n\\nIn the "},{"text":"Faction Outposts","color":"green"},{"text":" you can buy various "},{"text":"Shop Items","color":"gold"},{"text":" from the "},{"text":"Shop Manager","color":"red"},{"text":":"},{"text":"\\n","font":"minecraft:bcsmp"},{"text":" Shop Placer","color":"light_purple","hoverEvent":{"action":"show_text","contents":[{"text":"Levels 1-3"}]}},{"text":"\\nRight-click this item to create an area in which you can place other Shop Items. The higher the Level, the bigger the area."}]','[{"text":"","font":"minecraft:default","color":"black"},{"text":"","font":"minecraft:bcsmp","color":"white"},{"text":"\\n\\n\\n","font":"minecraft:bcsmp"},{"text":" Shop Container","color":"light_purple","hoverEvent":{"action":"show_text","contents":[{"text":"Levels 1-3"}]}},{"text":"\\nThis Barrel is the block in which you sell items. Each Level has more slots. Place the sold item in the top slot, and the price of that item in the bottom slot."}]','[{"text":"","font":"minecraft:default","color":"black"},{"text":"","font":"minecraft:bcsmp","color":"white"},{"text":"\\n\\n\\n","font":"minecraft:bcsmp"},{"text":" Shop Income Storage","color":"light_purple"},{"text":"\\nThis is the Barrel in which all the items your customers have paid will automatically go. But for it to work, you need to link it with the Shop Container."}]','[{"text":"","font":"minecraft:default","color":"black"},{"text":"","font":"minecraft:bcsmp","color":"white"},{"text":"\\n\\n\\n","font":"minecraft:bcsmp"},{"text":" Shop Stock Storage","color":"light_purple"},{"text":"\\nThis is the Barrel which stores all of your stock. Once you sell an item, it will automatically get removed from this Barrel. But for it to work, you need to link it with the Shop Container."}]','[{"text":"","font":"minecraft:default","color":"black"},{"text":"","font":"minecraft:bcsmp","color":"white"},{"text":"\\n\\n\\n","font":"minecraft:bcsmp"},{"text":" Border Tool","color":"light_purple"},{"text":"\\nHolding this item will make all Shop Area Borders visible."},{"text":"\\n","font":"minecraft:bcsmp"},{"text":" Shop Container Mode Switcher","color":"light_purple"},{"text":"\\nShift-right-clicking the Shop Container with this item will toggle the \'EDIT\' mode on and off."}]','[{"text":"","font":"minecraft:default","color":"black"},{"text":"","font":"minecraft:bcsmp","color":"white"},{"text":"\\n\\n\\n","font":"minecraft:bcsmp"},{"text":" Storage Linker","color":"light_purple"},{"text":"\\nLink Shop Storages to Shop Containers by shift-right-clicking them. Already existing links are visible when holding this item."}]','[{"text":"","font":"minecraft:default","color":"black"},{"text":"\\uE005","font":"minecraft:bcsmp","color":"white"},{"text":"\\n\\n\\n\\uE002","font":"minecraft:bcsmp"},{"text":" Shop Remover","color":"light_purple"},{"text":"\\nRight-click this item while standing in your Shop Area to remove it."}]','[{"text":"","font":"minecraft:default","color":"black"},{"text":"","font":"minecraft:bcsmp","color":"white"},{"text":"\\n\\n\\nImportant:\\n","color":"gold","bold":true},{"text":"The prices of items in the shops are "},{"text":"+20% higher","color":"green"},{"text":" if you are not in the same "},{"text":"Faction","color":"red"},{"text":" as the person who owns the shop. This feature can be disabled in the settings."}]','[{"text":"","font":"minecraft:default","color":"black"},{"text":"","font":"minecraft:bcsmp","color":"white"},{"text":"\\n\\n\\nThe Ender Dragon has received an overhaul. She has way "},{"text":"more attacks","color":"gold"},{"text":", a "},{"text":"Points System","color":"green"},{"text":" and "},{"text":"Unique Loot","color":"red"},{"text":". Once the dragon is low, it spawns a TOTEM which has to be destroyed by alternating melee and projectile attacks."}]','[{"text":"","font":"minecraft:default","color":"black"},{"text":"","font":"minecraft:bcsmp","color":"white"},{"text":"\\n\\n\\nYou earn points by collecting Dragon Breath, damaging the dragon, destroying End Crystals and by having placed Eyes of Ender."}]','[{"text":"","font":"minecraft:default","color":"black"},{"text":"","font":"minecraft:bcsmp","color":"white"},{"text":"\\n\\n\\nYou can also "},{"text":"steal points","color":"red"},{"text":" from other players by hitting them.\\n\\nAt the end of the fight, the person with the most points gets the best loot."}]','[{"text":"","font":"minecraft:default","color":"black"},{"text":"","font":"minecraft:bcsmp","color":"white"},{"text":"\\n\\n\\nThe Loot contains:","color":"gold"},{"text":"\\n","font":"minecraft:bcsmp"},{"text":" Diamonds"},{"text":"\\n","font":"minecraft:bcsmp"},{"text":" Special Banner"},{"text":"\\n","font":"minecraft:bcsmp"},{"text":" Reinforced Bottles"},{"text":"\\n","font":"minecraft:bcsmp"},{"text":" Equipment with impossible enchantments"},{"text":"\\n\\nAnd more..."}]','[{"text":"","font":"minecraft:default","color":"black"},{"text":"","font":"minecraft:bcsmp","color":"white"},{"text":"\\n\\n\\nThe first player to complete certain Advancements will receive a "},{"text":"Trophy","color":"gold"},{"text":" with their name & the Advancement on it. In the "},{"text":"Advancements Tab","color":"green"},{"text":", you can see which Trophies have already been obtained."}]','[{"text":"","font":"minecraft:default","color":"black"},{"text":"","font":"minecraft:bcsmp","color":"white"},{"text":"\\n\\n\\nThis Datapack also includes Quality of Life features such as:"},{"text":"\\n","font":"minecraft:bcsmp"},{"text":" Recipes","color":"blue"},{"text":"\\n- Dry Wet Sponge on Campfires\\n- Dye dyed Wool\\n- Dye dyed Concrete Powder\\n- Blast Raw Ore Blocks"}]','[{"text":"","font":"minecraft:default","color":"black"},{"text":"","font":"minecraft:bcsmp","color":"white"},{"text":"\\n\\n\\n- Stonecut Stone to Gravel\\n- Stonecut Sandstone to Sand\\n- Quartz Block to Quartz"}]','[{"text":"","font":"minecraft:default","color":"black"},{"text":"","font":"minecraft:bcsmp","color":"white"},{"text":"\\n\\n\\n","font":"minecraft:bcsmp"},{"text":" Other","color":"blue"},{"text":"\\n- Right-click grown Crops with Hoe\\n- Right-click Piston with Slimeball\\n- Right-click Sticky Piston with Axe\\n- Strike Brewing Stand with Lightning to upgrade Potions"}]','[{"text":"","font":"minecraft:default","color":"black"},{"text":"","font":"minecraft:bcsmp","color":"white"},{"text":"\\n\\n\\nTo setup the SMP properly, you need to specify the SMP Owner by running this command:\\n"},{"text":"/tag .. add SMPOwner","color":"red","hoverEvent":{"action":"show_text","contents":[{"text":"/tag  add SMPOwner"}]},"clickEvent":{"action":"copy_to_clipboard","value":"/tag  add SMPOwner"}},{"text":"\\n\\nAfter that, you can specify some Vanilla gamerules and Custom gamerules. To do this,"}]','[{"text":"","font":"minecraft:default","color":"black"},{"text":"","font":"minecraft:bcsmp","color":"white"},{"text":"\\n\\n\\nrun the following command:\\n"},{"text":"/function bcsmp:setup_smp/setup","color":"red","hoverEvent":{"action":"show_text","contents":[{"text":"/function bcsmp:setup_smp/setup"}]},"clickEvent":{"action":"copy_to_clipboard","value":"/function bcsmp:setup_smp/setup"}},{"text":"\\n\\nThis will open a chat menu in which you can enable and disable various gamerules."}]','[{"text":"","font":"minecraft:default","color":"black"},{"text":"","font":"minecraft:bcsmp","color":"white"},{"text":"\\n\\n\\n\\nYou are allowed to use this Datapack on your server "},{"text":"if","color":"gold","bold":true},{"text":" you don\'t make any money with it and  you credit the creators:"},{"text":"\\n\\nBlue\'s Production Team","color":"red","bold":true,"hoverEvent":{"action":"show_text","contents":[{"text":"Click to visit YouTube Channel","color":"gold","bold":true}]},"clickEvent":{"action":"open_url","value":"https://www.youtube.com/c/BluesProductionTeam"}}]']}
